Package org.ordersmgmtapp.genericdao

Class GenericDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
org.ordersmgmtapp.genericdao.GenericDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of entity handled by this DAO.
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericDAORepo<T>
public class GenericDAO<T> extends Object implements GenericDAORepo<T>
GenericDAO class provides generic methods for CRUD operations on any table entity.
